stock.database

Class StockDataBase

  • java.lang.Object
    • stock.database.StockDataBase

  • public class StockDataBase
extends java.lang.Object
    This class manages all the Order(s) and Transaction(s) of a specific Stock.

    There are 3 main Collections:

    • awaitingBuyOrders.
    • awaitingSellOrders.
    • successfullyFinishedTransactions.
    Version:
    1.2

      Element = Transaction.

      • getTotalPeriod

        public <E extends Periodable> long getTotalPeriod(java.util.Collection<E> collection)
        This method calculates the Total-Collection-Period of all the Elements in the Collection and returns it.
        Type Parameters:
        E - is the element in the collection given.
        Parameters:
        collection - is the Collection to calculate its period.
        Returns:
        The Total-Collection-Period.
